category: news
title: "IDC: AI market revenues continue to grow but at a slower rate"
excerpt: "IDC has said that it expects to see worldwide revenue in the artificial intelligence (AI) market rise this year by around 12.3% compared to 2019. With the increase factored in, the analyst said that the market could see $156.5 billion in revenue this year."
